page.title: 03The Army Camp
page.content: A large amount of our area is covered by a large army camp. The camp is situated to the north of Colerne. The camp was an R.A.F.base nine years ago, but it now belongs to the Junior Leaders Regiment R.C.T.. The camp is called Azimghur Barracks. On the camp there are houses for people in the forces. The camp has four estates each with roughly 90 quarters.In all there are 385 married quarters and 40 of them are empty. There are 92 R.A.F houses and most of these are on Pinewood Estate. The facilities on the camp for families include most of the Gymnasium, N.A.A.F.I., Post Office and Horse Riding. Living in the camp is enjoyable and is situated in a nice part of Wiltshire.
